data.eml:eml: Three new species of Coccophagus (Hymenoptera: Aphelinidae) from China, with new distributional data for three additional species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Ye, Li, Cheng-De (2017): Three new species of Coccophagus (Hymenoptera: Aphelinidae) from China, with new distributional data for three additional species. Zootaxa 4294 (2): 256-270, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4294.2.8
